result.execSummary:
The defendant Paul Wayne Krueger was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Paul Wayne Krueger is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Paul Wayne Krueger was found guilty of Criminal Damage to Property [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Continue on current payment plan until attorney fees paid in full.
DNA surcharge.
Defendant to report to St. Croix County Jail to submit a DNA sample.

CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Evenson ADA: Edward Minser DF ATTY: Christopher Stephen Petros DF: Paul Wayne Krueger appeared. Case called at 1:15. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads G to Ct 1 in 16CM47. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 1 in 16cm47. On motion of the State without objecton, Crt dismisses Ct 2 in 16CM47. Sentencing arguments. Crt orders: Court authorizes the release of restitution to the victim. 
- Costs of $243.00
- Submit DNA sample and pay surcharge of $200.00
- Restitution of $817.00

DE to pay today.

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference at 03-17-2016 02:45 pm

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Whitney H.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

CO:  TCH for RMW, (Recorder), Clerk: E. Ferrill, ADA:  Megan E. Kelly,  DF ATTY:  Joseph Robert Caton for today,   DF:  Paul Wayne Krueger appeared. Defendant does not qualify for PD - PFAC.  Court confirms address.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial. Refund bond on file to payor.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 17, 2016 at 02:45 pm.
